This Game Is Amazing, If you like the constant though of killing yourself cause you are ether under achieving in a game or over achieving.

Now you must be wondering how can you want to die if your doing good? 

-Well thats simple your doing good cause your team isnt doing anything meaning you have to try harder than what five other people can so that you stand a chance of winning and even if you do that good luck next game cause the same thing will happen.

See now if you want to play this game i recommend getting people to play with cause if you put time and money into it you will not want to stop playing not cause its a good game. its because you will be so depressed about wasting money.
I recommend this game, its really fun and has a high skill threshold that you would want to achieve but in the end once you accomplish feats you never did before you will have a good time
